name: react-express-electron-boilerplate
description: A boilerplate to generate an Electron app with a React Front end and an Express BackEnd embedded.

scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd server && npm run electron-dev "
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.remove-create-dir: rm -rf dist && rm -rf build && rm -rf server/dist && mkdir dist && mkdir build && mkdir server/dist
scripts.build-all: npm run remove-create-dir && cd client && npm react-build && cd ../server && npm run build && npm run electron-build-all
scripts.build-win: npm run remove-create-dir && cd client && npm react-build && cd ../server && npm run build && npm run electron-build-win && npm run remove-package-folder && npm run move-build
scripts.build-linux: npm run remove-create-dir && cd client && npm react-build && cd ../server && npm run build && npm run electron-build-linux && npm run remove-package-folder && npm run move-build
scripts.build-mac: npm run remove-create-dir && cd client && npm react-build && cd ../server && npm run build && npm run electron-build-mac && npm run remove-package-folder && npm run move-build
scripts.test: cd client && npm run test-no-watch && cd ../server && npm run test
scripts.test-coverage: cd client && npm run test-coverage && cd ../server && npm run test-coverage

author: Pablo Martinez
